item.title: DSC Community Call Wednesday, January 31, 2018
item.dc:creator: PowerShell and DSC Team Channel
item.description:
This is a recording of the DSC Resource Kit community call that occurred on 12/31/2018

The meeting agenda, notes and transcript are available here: https://github.com/PowerShell/DscResources/tree/master/CommunityCalls/2018-01-31 If you'd like to provide comments, questions, or feedback for this video, please do so on GitHub

Main DSC Resource Kit page: https://github.com/PowerShell/DscResources/

item.title: PowerShell Core Community Call - September 21, 2017
item.dc:creator: PowerShell and DSC Team Channel
item.description:
Unfortunately, the audio on this video is significantly corrupted. You can still somewhat make out what's being said, though, so I chose to include it anyway. Sorry about that!

For more information on the PowerShell Core Community Call, check us out on GitHub: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell-RFC/tree/master/CommunityCall
